title: Dhamma School exams on 24th April
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Buddhist Affairs has decided to hold the Dhamma School Grade Examinations from Grade 6 to Grade 10 on April 24th.
This year the examination will be held at 10,320 Dhamma Schools covering the entire island.
Due to the curfew in the country, Dhamma School examinations could NOT be held on the scheduled date.
SC permits examination of FRs against Emergency, Curfew, & SM Ban
